name: Spirit of Spring Jam
description:
Spirit of Spring Jam - Accelerate the arrival of spring with the help of the spirit, which took the form of an elf girl, and defeat the evil snowmen, while restoring the balance of the arrival of spring.

To turn off control prompts, press Q

E - interact in flower

Left mouse button - storm that restores trees

right mouse button - storm destroying snowmen

space - jump

wsad - movement

r - equip sword and disable fire shtorm
